|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050500332" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"2052500400" is silkscreened on the wireless module. :The same text is silkscreened on the v1's board. The firmware is shared between v2 and v3, presumably the hardware is very similar. {{WiFiCert|WFA53887|06/26/2014}} ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Archer%20C7_2.0/ Firmware Interface] *[http://www.tp-link.com/resources/document/Archer_C7_V2_User_Guide_1910010809.pdf User Guide] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32498-tp-link-archer-c7-v2-reviewed Review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: QCA9558 3x3 802.11abgn SoC :RAM: Winbond W9751G6JB 128MB DDR2 :Flash: Winbond W25Q128FV 16MB :Switch: Atheros AR8327 GbE
